title: Spacious New Condo. Patio, Laundry Room, Fireplace, Swimming Pool!
posting_body: We have a newly remodeled spacious 1 bedroom/1 bathroom downstairs condo available for immediate move-in.
The unit is located in a resort-style complex in San Jose (south).
The unit is completely re-built and re-designed, so everything is brand new!
UTILITIES INCLUDED: Water, Sewer, Garbage, Landscaping
Condo is rented unfurnished.
UNIT FEATURES:
•	~800 sq. foot floor plan
•	Corner unit – great location inside the complex
•	Private patio big enough for outdoor furniture, BBQ or storage
•	Air conditioning and central heating
•	Brand new recessed lights with dimmer switches in every room
•	New washer and dryer inside the unit
•	Cable and telephone ready
•	One covered parking space + plenty of extra parking next to it
LIVING ROOM
•	Large separate living room (~15 x 15 feet)
•	Wood burning fireplace
•	Large sliding doors to the patio with plenty of light
•	New hardwood floors, brand new window blinds
•	Newly painted with custom colors
KITCHEN / DINING ROOM
•	Newly remodeled kitchen and dining area
•	Kitchen features wooden cabinets, new faucet, garbage disposal, etc.
•	Brand hardwood flooring
•	New upscale appliances: large refrigerator, electric stove, dishwasher, microwave/stove hood
BEDROOM
•	Large separate bedroom (~13 x 14 feet) with 2 spacious built-in closets
•	New mirrored closet doors
•	Closet lights
•	New plush carpet
BATHROOM
•	Shower/tub combo and toilet are separated by the door from the sink/vanity area
•	Brand new faucet, bath fixtures, lamps, mirrors, toilet , etc.
•	Built-in bathroom closet for extra storage with lights inside
COMPLEX FEATURES
•	Resort-style condo complex with mature redwood and other trees
•	Beautifully landscaped and maintained
•	Nice quiet neighborhood with caring and respectful neighbors
•	Heated pool, spa, and clubhouse
•	Close to Highways 85/101, Light Rail, CalTrain , Kaiser Hospital, Oakridge Mall and Almaden Shopping Plaza
•	New Santana Row style shopping and dining center (walking distance) that features malls, shops, restaurants, outdoor cafes, etc.
PET POLICY: Pets are allowed
LEASE TERMS:
Month to Month (long-term lease preferred)
DEPOSIT: $2,000
ADDRESS: 5210 Makati Circle, San Jose, CA 95123
PHONE NUMBER: If you would like to see the unit, please email or call
show contact info
